WorkItem.Description:
I made some rows that meet set conditions, blink.
It worked fine until I scrolled the DataGrid.
The problem was those rows didn't  meet conditions began to blink.
The more rows blinked as I scrolled more, up and down.
 
 
       <wpfToolkit:DataGrid Grid.Row="1" x:Name="DG"
                             ItemsSource="{Binding Source={StaticResource MyCVS}}"
                             IsReadOnly="True" CanUserAddRows="False"
                             AutoGenerateColumns="False"
                             MouseLeftButtonUp="DataGrid_MouseLeftButtonUp"
                             SelectedCellsChanged="DG_SelectedCellsChanged">
 
            <wpfToolkit:DataGrid.ItemContainerStyle>
                <Style TargetType="wpfToolkit:DataGridRow">
                    <Setter Property="Padding" Value="0,5,0,5"/>
                    <Style.Triggers>
                        <MultiDataTrigger>
                            <MultiDataTrigger.Conditions>
                                <Condition Binding="{Binding Status}" Value="Completed"/>
                                <Condition Binding="{Binding NextProcess}" Value=""/>
                            </MultiDataTrigger.Conditions>
                            
                            <MultiDataTrigger.EnterActions>
                                <BeginStoryboard x:Name="brinkingRow">
                                    <Storyboard>
                                        <DoubleAnimation 
                                            Storyboard.TargetProperty="Opacity" From="0" To="1" Duration="0:0:0.5" 
			                                RepeatBehavior="Forever" AutoReverse="true"/>
                                    </Storyboard>
                                </BeginStoryboard>
                            </MultiDataTrigger.EnterActions>
                        </MultiDataTrigger>
 
 
 
                        <DataTrigger Binding="{Binding DateToShip, Converter={StaticResource DatePastNowFutureConverter}}" Value="1">
                            <Setter Property="Opacity" Value="0.5"/>
                        </DataTrigger>
                    </Style.Triggers>
                </Style>
            </wpfToolkit:DataGrid.ItemContainerStyle>
WorkItem.Summary: DataGrid: Made rows blink fine. But once vertically scrolled, a trouble began.
